title: Can not see my Club tag / Can't rejoin my Club
body:
I am the owner of a Club but I can't see my tag, I tried leaving the Club and rejoining it but now I can't join back in, my friends can see the Club roster and it says I'm still in it as the owner however when I go to view clubs nothing is listed, not exactly sure how to proceed from here. This has been a niggling issue for quite some time.

Any information towards resolving this issue is much appreciated. :)

replies.body:
We've seen a few remaining issues with clubs lately. This particular issue will require access to a few different tools, so submitting a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to our specialists would be the best course of action here.

Let me know if you have any questions.
